job_title: Waitress, Event Assistant, Hostess, Barista in Winchester, England
pros: A fantastic family of people to work with, always friendly, engaging and helpful! I have worked across multiple departments and always been supported in learning about procedures as well as the wider projects around the park. It is a wonderful place to work everyday and the opportunity to see some of the most rare and incredible animals in the world is an unparalleled privilege!
cons: Sometimes dealing with customers who are rude or aggressive can be hard work, but that is part of working in any customer-facing role. Most guests are lovely though!
